total number of CDS where len >= 4k is 3473
number_of_exons is 7
intron_gap is 7142
note that every intron is the same
length of one of the exons is 6441
length of one of the exons is 12507
length of one of the exons is 4827
length of one of the exons is 7239
length of one of the exons is 5640
length of one of the exons is 5997
length of one of the exons is 10851
